titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z131: Ketubah, 1843.

notesStmt.note: Dimensions for the document currently unattainable.

The text records the date Sunday the 14th of Tishrei, 6004 to Creation. The year is clearly incorrect; the scribe may well have intended to write [5]604 -- a year in which the 14th of Tishrei indeed fell on a Sunday.
The lowermost part of the page, beneath the ketubbah text, has been cut out.

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Hebrew
